synopsis.text: Summer, Rick, and Morty embark on a thrilling journey in this anime spin-off of the beloved Rick and Morty series. Directed by the talented Takashi Sano (known for his work on Rick and Morty vs. Genocider and Summer Meets God), this adaptation takes inspiration from the original series' themes and events while offering a fresh and exciting perspective. Produced by Telecom Animation Film, this anime promises to deliver the same wacky adventures and thought-provoking concepts that fans have come to love, all while standing on its own as an original work. Don't miss out on this unique take on the Rick and Morty universe!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
